/* Department.ListDepartment */
WITH RECURSIVE R AS ( SELECT DEPARTMENT_ID, COMPANY_ID, UP_DEPARTMENT_ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, DEPARTMENT_ORDER, CAST(DEPARTMENT_ORDER AS CHAR(200)) AS SORT_ORDER FROM HR_DEPARTMENT WHERE UP_DEPARTMENT_ID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT A.DEPARTMENT_ID, A.COMPANY_ID, A.UP_DEPARTMENT_ID, A.DEPARTMENT_NAME, A.DEPARTMENT_ORDER, CONCAT(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', LPAD(A.DEPARTMENT_ORDER, 5, '0')) AS SORT_ORDER FROM HR_DEPARTMENT A INNER JOIN R ON A.UP_DEPARTMENT_ID = R.DEPARTMENT_ID ) SELECT R.DEPARTMENT_ID, R.COMPANY_ID, R.UP_DEPARTMENT_ID, R.DEPARTMENT_NAME, R.DEPARTMENT_ORDER, CD.CODE_NAME AS RANK_CODE_NAME, CD2.CODE_NAME AS JOB_TITLE_CODE_NAME FROM R INNER JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE E ON E.COMPANY_ID = R.COMPANY_ID INNER JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE_COMPANY EC ON EC.COMPANY_ID = R.COMPANY_ID AND EC.EMPLOYEE_ID = E.EMPLOYEE_ID INNER JOIN CO_CODE CD ON CD.CODE_VALUE = EC.RANK_CODE AND CD.UP_CODE_ID = 'RANK_00' INNER JOIN CO_CODE CD2 ON CD2.CODE_VALUE = EC.JOB_TITLE_CODE AND CD2.UP_CODE_ID = 'JOB_TITLE_00' WHERE 1=1
AND E.EMPLOYEE_ID = @EmployeeId
ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', 1) AS UNSIGNED), CASE WHEN R.SORT_ORDER LIKE '%-%' THEN CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', -1) AS UNSIGNED) ELSE 0 END
